thread.title: San Francisco 49ers quarterback Sam Darnold sneaks in end zone for QB's 13th career rushing touchdown
thread.title_full: San Francisco 49ers quarterback Sam Darnold sneaks in end zone for QB's 13th career rushing touchdown

title: San Francisco 49ers quarterback Sam Darnold sneaks in end zone for QB's 13th career rushing touchdown
text: NFL Game Highlights Darnold sneaks in end zone for QB's 13th career rushing TD San Francisco 49ers quarterback Sam Darnold sneaks in the end zone for the QB's 13th career rushing touchdown. [ video ](/videos/darnold-sneaks-in-end-zone-for-qb-s-13th-career-rushing-td) Darnold sneaks in end zone for QB's 13th career rushing TD San Francisco 49ers quarterback Sam Darnold sneaks in the end zone for the QB's 13th career rushing touchdown. [ video ](/videos/matt-prater-s-23-yard-fg-ties-cardinals-with-seahawks-at-3-apiece) Matt Prater's 23-yard FG ties Cardinals with Seahawks at 3 apiece Arizona Cardinals kicker Matt Prater's 23-yard FG ties Cardinals with Seahawks at 3 apiece. On this kick, Matt Prater kicked his 400th field goal. [ video ](/videos/anders-carlson-pushes-41-yard-fg-wide-left) Anders Carlson pushes 41-yard FG wide left Green Bay Packers kicker Anders Carlson cannot connect on a 41-yard field goal attempt, as it sails wide left against the Chicago Bears. [ video ](/videos/terry-mclaurin-takes-rush-attempt-for-19-yard-pickup-in-cowboys-territory) Terry McLaurin takes rush attempt for 19-yard pickup in Cowboys territory Washington Commanders wide receiver Terry McLaurin takes a rush attempt for 19-yard pickup in Dallas Cowboys territory. [ video ](/videos/saquon-barkley-s-ninth-scrimmage-td-of-23-extends-giants-lead-vs-eagles) Saquon Barkley's ninth scrimmage TD of '23 extends Giants' lead vs. Eagles New York Giants running back Saquon Barkley rushes for a 2-yard touchdown vs. Philadelphia Eagles. [ video ](/videos/can-t-miss-play-jeudy-powers-forward-for-improbable-24-yard-td) Can't-Miss Play: Jeudy powers forward for improbable 24-yard TD Denver Broncos wide receiver Jerry Jeudy powers forward for an improbable 24-yard touchdown against the Las Vegas Raiders. [ video ](/videos/tyrod-taylor-s-26-yard-loft-to-wan-dale-robinson-gets-giants-inside-phi-5-yard-l) Tyrod Taylor's 26-yard loft to Wan'Dale Robinson gets Giants inside PHI 5-yard line New York Giants quarterback Tyrod Taylor completes a 26-yard pass to wide receiver WanDale Robinson. [ video ](/videos/maxx-crosby-chases-down-stidham-for-his-14-5-sack-of-the-season) Maxx Crosby chases down Stidham for his 14.5 sack of the season Las Vegas Raiders defensive end Maxx Crosby chases down Denver Broncos quarterback Jarrett Stidham for his 14.5 sack of the 2023 NFL season. [ video ](/videos/jartavius-martin-s-second-int-of-rookie-year-comes-vs-prescott-in-week-18) Jartavius Martin's second INT of rookie year comes vs. Prescott in Week 18 Washington Commanders cornerback Jartavius Martin's second interception of rookie year comes vs. Dallas Cowboys quarterback Dak Prescott in Week 18. [ video ](/videos/eagles-can-t-convert-on-fourth-down-after-hurts-pass-falls-short) Eagles can't convert on fourth down after Hurts' pass falls short Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Jalen Hurts throws an incomplete pass on fourth down for a turnover on downs to the Giants. [ video ](/videos/kyler-murray-mashes-his-accelerator-on-season-long-33-yard-scramble) Kyler Murray mashes his accelerator on season-long 33-yard scramble Arizona Cardinals quarterback Kyler Murray mashes his accelerator on season-long 33-yard scramble. [ video ](/videos/derek-carr-s-best-throws-from-4-td-game-week-18) Derek Carr's best throws from 4-TD game | Week 18 Watch New Orleans Saints quarterback Derek Carr's best throws from his 4-TD game vs. the Atlanta Falcons in Week 18 of the 2023 NFL season. [ video ](/videos/james-connor-slams-the-gas-pedal-on-20-yard-rush) James Conner slams the gas pedal on 20-yard rush Arizona Cardinals running back James Conner slams the gas pedal on 20-yard rush. [ video ](/videos/stidham-locates-johnson-over-the-middle-for-a-36-yard-gain) Stidham locates Johnson over the middle for a 36-yard gain Denver Broncos quarterback Jarrett Stidham locates wide receiver Brandon Johnson over the middle for a 36-yard gain against the Las Vegas Raiders. [ video ](/videos/tyrique-stevenson-punches-out-ball-to-deny-doubs-td) Tyrique Stevenson punches out ball to deny Doubs' TD Green Bay Packers wide receiver Romeo Doubs nearly hauls in a touchdown pass from quarterback Jordan Love but Chicago Bears defensive back Tyrique Stevenson is able to punch the ball out before completing the reception. [ video ](/videos/khalil-mack-engulfs-gabbert-to-secure-his-17th-sack-of-2023-season) Khalil Mack engulfs Gabbert to secure his 17th sack of 2023 season Los Angeles Chargers linebacker Khalil Mack engulfs Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Blaine Gabbert to secure his 17th sack of the 2023 season. [ video ](/videos/howell-s-fourth-down-td-pass-to-robinson-jr-gets-d-c-on-board-vs-dallas) Howell's fourth-down TD pass to Robinson Jr. gets D.C. on board vs. Dallas Washington Commanders quarterback Sam Howell's fourth-down touchdown pass to running back Brian Robinson Jr. gets D.C. on board vs. Dallas Cowboys. [ video ](/videos/elijah-mitchell-submits-his-angry-runs-bid-on-14-yard-carry-vs-rams) Elijah Mitchell submits his 'Angry Runs' bid on 14-yard carry vs. Rams San Francisco 49ers running back Elijah Mitchell submits his 'Angry Runs' bid on a 14-yard carry against the Los Angeles Rams. [ video ](/videos/can-t-miss-play-meyers-magic-trick-play-turned-into-td-for-vegas) Can't-Miss Play: Meyers MAGIC! Trick play turned into TD for Vegas Las Vegas wide receiver Jakobi Meyers finds a way to turn a trick play into a touchdown to Vegas against the Denver Broncos. [ video ](/videos/can-t-miss-play-commanders-block-aubrey-s-fg-for-66-yard-return) Can't-Miss Play: Commanders block Aubrey's FG for 66-YARD return Washington Commanders block Dallas Cowboys kicker Aubrey's field goal for a 66-YARD return. [ video ](/videos/a-j-brown-sustains-apparent-lower-body-injury-after-fumble-vs-giants) A.J. Brown sustains apparent lower-body injury after fumble vs. Giants New York Giants recover a fumble by Philadelphia Eagles wide receiver A.J. Brown. [ video ](/videos/jordan-mason-hits-the-hole-for-16-yard-burst-across-midfield) Jordan Mason hits the hole for 16-yard burst across midfield San Francisco 49ers running back Jordan Mason hits the hole for a 16-yard burst across the midfield logo. [ video ](/videos/browning-recovers-his-own-fumble-after-strip-sack-by-alex-wright) Browning recovers his own fumble after strip-sack by Alex Wright Cincinnati Bengals quarterback Jake Browning recovers his own fumble after strip-sack by Cleveland Browns linebacker Alex Wright. [ video ](/videos/zamir-white-shoots-the-gap-for-a-12-yard-run) Zamir White shoots the gap for a 12-yard run Las Vegas Raiders running back Zamir White shoots the gap for a 12-yard run against the Denver Broncos.
